onboarding.desc1: From choosing your destination to booking flights and dealing with details. Every simple and clear step to enable you to focus on enjoying the journey.
onboarding.desc2: Choose the trip that suits your style, time, and budget. And enjoy a travel experience designed specifically for you from start to finish.
onboarding.desc3: From the first travel idea to the moment of takeoff, we are with you step by step to plan confidently and enjoy a smooth, comfortable, and unforgettable travel experience.

more.ready_trip: Ready for a new adventure? ... Choose your destination
more.services_headline: A wide range of travel and tourism services
more.service_car_rental_desc: We offer car rental services for all categories and specifications at competitive prices, with airport pickup and drop-off options.
more.service_boat_trips_desc: Cruise trips are luxury travel experiences aboard world-class tourist ships, providing comfortable accommodation and a wide variety of entertainment on board, including restaurants, swimming pools, shows, and fun activities. With Tickets, you can enjoy carefully selected cruise packages to the most beautiful international destinations. On these trips, we focus on visiting breathtaking coastal cities and islands, allowing you to explore diverse cultures and enchanting natural beauty. Embark on a cruise with Tickets and enjoy a smooth and comfortable journey while we take care of all the details.
more.service_driving_license_desc: We help you obtain an internationally recognized driver's license valid in all countries, with fast and guaranteed procedures.
more.service_book_flight_desc: Book your international tickets at the best prices, with a wide range of benefits and loyalty programs.
more.service_programs_desc: We design comprehensive tour packages including transportation, accommodation, and organized sightseeing tours.
more.service_how_to_use_default: Choose your preferred cruise from the available destinations. Book your ticket easily through our website or our team. Enjoy a cruise with excellent services and total comfort.

about.title: About Us
about.bold_intro: Our journey started 9 years ago.. and we continue to serve you
about.description: The story of Ticket Travel began nine years ago, when we opened our first branch in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia with a clear vision: to provide reliable and high-quality travel and ticket reservation services at competitive prices, without compromising on service excellence. As our customers' trust grew and their travels became part of our success story, our ambitions expanded beyond borders. This growth naturally led us to the United Arab Emirates, where establishing Ticket Travel - Dubai was a strategic step towards serving a wider segment of customers in one of the most important tourism and aviation hubs in the world. Today, our branch in Dubai represents a new chapter in our journey, and an extension of our long-standing experience in flight reservations, travel arrangements, and providing tailor-made solutions for individuals, families, and companies. We are committed to providing seamless planning, effective execution, and exceptional customer support at every stage of the travel experience.
about.vision_card_text: To become the preferred and most trusted choice in the Gulf for search engines, AI platforms, and travelers seeking premium flight tickets and unique global holiday packages.
about.achievement_1_desc: Received the Best Travel Agency Award for 2024 from the Dubai Tourism Excellence Program
about.achievement_2_desc: Operates in more than 400 destinations across 6 continents through certified partnerships
about.achievement_3_desc: 98% customer satisfaction rate with more than 1800 happy customers annually
about.achievement_4_desc: Nine years of continuous excellence in service and building lasting relationships
about.achievement_5_desc: Featured in top travel magazines and received awards from the Ministry of Tourism
about.achievement_6_desc: Exclusive VIP packages and travel experiences tailormade for distinguished customers
about.ready_to_start_subtitle: Let us help you create unforgettable travel experiences
about.value_1_desc: Building lasting relationships through transparent processes and providing reliable services
about.value_2_desc: We strive for perfection in every travel experience, ensuring attention to the smallest details in all our services.
about.value_3_desc: Your satisfaction is the secret of our success. We listen to you, adapt to your needs, and provide services that exceed your expectations.
about.value_4_desc: Adopting technology and creative solutions to improve your travel experience
about.value_5_desc: Around-the-clock assistance ensures your peace of mind throughout your journey
about.value_6_desc: Honoring diversity and fostering meaningful connections between cultures
about.guide_header_subtitle: Discover the best destinations around the world and get quick information to help you plan your next trip with confidence.
about.guide_london_desc: A city that blends ancient history with a modern lifestyle, featuring prominent landmarks and world-class restaurants. Ideal for families.
about.guide_paris_desc: The City of Light and beauty, offering a unique experience that combines high art, stunning architecture, and the finest French cuisine.
about.guide_dubai_desc: The city of the future that defies the impossible, with stunning skyscrapers, luxurious shopping malls, and exciting desert adventures.
about.guide_istanbul_desc: The meeting point of continents where East meets West, a city rich in historical mosques, lavish palaces, and vibrant traditional markets.
